2019 Cross Country Roster

Choose a Player:

Marie Gaudin

Class Senior

Hometown Arlington, Wash.

Highschool Arlington HS

Major Biology

Bio

Related

Historical

Biography

WSU CAREER. JUNIOR (2018-19): Cross Country - Ran in five total events during the year, seeing her best finish at both the Cougar Classic and the Inland Empire Championships, placing 19th overall in both races...Was named to the Pac-12 All-Academic Honorable Mention team...

SOPHOMORE (2017-18): Cross Country - At Joe Piane Notre Dame Invitational finished sixth on team/135th overall...at Nuttycombe Invitational finished sixth on team/74th overall...at Pac-12 Championships finished 94th overall/seventh on team...at NCAA West Region Championships finished fifth on team/140th overall/138th in scoring.

FRESHMAN (2016-17): Cross Country - Sundodger finish 38th overall/9th on team...at Washington Invite 74th overall/10th on team...at Inland Empire Champs 5k, 25th overall/third on team...Indoor - Ran mile PR of 5:28.16i at WSU Cougar Indoor (2/04/17, Pullman)...Outdoor - Ran PR and finished first in 1500m with a time of 4:44.63 at Cougar Invitational (4/29/17, Pullman)...at War X (4/8/17,Spokane) ran PR and finished third in 800m with a time of 2:19.82.

HIGH SCHOOL CAREER. Earned eight varsity letters at Arlington High School…four letters in cross-country for coach Mike Shierk…four letters in track for coach Judd Hunter…Eagles girls team two-time WESCO/Cascade Conference champions…two-time state 3A cross country championships competitor…two-time Nike Cross Regional Northwest competitor with 17th-place finish as senior…on the track, won WESCO North 800m, 1600m and 3200m titles as senior…fourth in state 3A championships in 3200m with PR time of 11:01.98…10th in 1600m at state meet…school record holder in 1600m (5:00.80) and 3200m.

PERSONAL. Born July 1998, in Dearborn, Michigan…father Dominic is an EMS helicopter pilot…mother Annemarie is an English teacher…older brother Charles…younger sisters Sophie and Lucie…National Honor Society member…graduated with 3.9 GPA…enjoys riding horses…interested in majoring in biology at WSU.

GAUDIN’S WSU BESTS

800m - 2:19.82 (2017)

1500m - 4:44.63 (2017)

Mile - 5:28.16i (2017)
